snippet.title: Layers of Fear - Cinematic Story Trailer
snippet.description:
It's time. All stories must come to an end. Discover the final chapter that will, in fact, be the first... and link all of the Layers' characters and events together.

This is the story of the Writer. One day, she moves to a far-off lighthouse, intending to create her magnum opus. However, she encounters something beyond her expectations in this isolated place.

"It's been years, and yet it all still feels unreal. The memories. The nightmares. They never left this place..."

Feel the horror hidden inside an abandoned lighthouse - a place of unknown origin. Where the ominous atmosphere is palpable, with hints of a ghostly entity lurking within its walls.

Experience the nightmare of a man drowning in his own madness. 

Layers of Fear coming out June 15 on the Apple silicon Mac lineup, PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S.

Steam wishlist here: https://bit.ly/LoF_on_Steam 
PlayStation  wishlist here: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10004877/
GOG wishlist here: https://www.gog.com/en/game/layers_of_fear_2023

#LayersOfFear #StoryTrailer #BlooberTeam
